mention.text: The brutal beating of Rodney Glen King by Los Angeles policemen
a warning against further run-ins with the police
Rodney Glen King by Los Angeles policemen
the beating on the police communications system
an `` aberration '' as Chief Daryl Gates claims
Mr. Gates , who yesterday was put on a 60-day leave by the Los Angeles Police Commission
the department that allowed the brutalizing of Rodney Glen King
the brutalizing of Rodney Glen King
community policing , in which officers work with citizens to improve neighborhoods and prevent crime
a police chief seeking to reduce conflict in the community
a special unit that had shot many criminals during stakeouts
the officers who did the ransacking
condemnation of misconduct and excessive force
Mr. Gates 's military style of policing
the videotape of the LAPD brutality
the police chief in San Jose
